genericRouterNoVcs.cc

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*
00002  * =====================================================================================
00003  *
00004  *       Filename:  genericRouterNoVcs.cc
00005  *
00006  *! \brief    Description: Implementing a generic 4 stage physical router model
00007  *    BW->RC->SA->ST->LT
00008  *    Buffer write(BW)
00009  *    Route Computation (RC)
00010  *    Configure Crossbar (CC)
00011  *    Switch Traversal (ST)
00012  *    Link Traversal (LT)
00013  *
00014  *    Model Description in cycles:
00015  *    ---------------------------
00016  *    BW and RC stages happen in the same cycle ( BW pushes the flits into the
00017  *    input buffer and the RC unit. )
00018  *    SA: Pick one output port from n requesting input ports (0<n<p) for the pxp crossbar 
00019  *    ST: Move the flits across the crossbar and push it out on the link
00020  *    LT: This is not modelled within the router and is part of the link component.
00021  *
00022  *        Version:  1.0
00023  *        Created:  03/11/2010 09:20:54 PM
00024  *       Revision:  none
00025  *       Compiler:  gcc
00026  *
00027  *         Author:  Mitchelle Rasquinha (), mitchelle.rasquinha@gatech.edu
00028  *        Company:  Georgia Institute of Technology
00029  *
00030  * =====================================================================================
00031  */
00032 
00033 #ifndef  _genericRouterNoVcs_cc_INC
00034 #define  _genericRouterNoVcs_cc_INC
00035 
00036 #include        "genericRouterNoVcs.h"
00037 using namespace std;
00038 
00039 GenericRouterNoVcs::GenericRouterNoVcs ()
00040 {
00041     name = "Router" ;
00042     ticking = false;
00043 }  /* -----  end of method GenericRouterNoVcs::GenericRouterNoVcs  (constructor)  ----- */
00044 
00045 GenericRouterNoVcs::~GenericRouterNoVcs()
00046 {
00047 }
00048 
00049 void
00050 GenericRouterNoVcs::init (uint p, uint v, uint cr, uint bs)
00051 {
00052     ports =p;
00053     vcs =v;
00054     credits =cr;
00055     buffer_size = bs;
00056 
00057     address = myId();
00058 
00059     /*  set_input_ports(ports); */
00060     in_buffers.resize(ports);
00061     decoders.resize(ports);
00062     input_buffer_state.resize(ports*vcs);
00063     swa.resize(ports);
00064     downstream_credits.resize(ports);
00065 
00066     /* set_output_ports(ports); */
00067     xbar.set_input_ports(ports);
00068     xbar.set_output_ports(ports);
00069     xbar.set_no_virtual_channels(vcs);
00070 
00071     /* All decoders and vc arbiters need to know the node_ip for routing */
00072     for(uint i=0; i<ports; i++)
00073     {
00074         decoders[i].node_ip = node_ip;
00075         decoders[i].address = address;
00076     }
00077 
00078     /*  set_no_virtual_channels(vcs); */
00079     for(uint i=0; i<ports; i++)
00080     {
00081         downstream_credits[i].resize(vcs);
00082         in_buffers[i].resize( vcs, buffer_size );
00083         decoders[i].resize( vcs );
00084     }
00085 
00086     for(uint i=0; i<ports; i++)
00087         for(uint j=0; j<vcs; j++)
00088             downstream_credits[i][j] = credits;
00089 
00090     /* init the countes */
00091     packets = 0;
00092     flits = 0;
00093     total_packet_latency = 0;
00094 
00095     return ;
00096 }               /* -----  end of function GenericRouterNoVcs::init  ----- */
00097

00106         decoders[i].grid_yloc.resize(nodes);
00107     }

00123 
00124 void
00125 GenericRouterNoVcs::process_event ( IrisEvent* e )
00126 {
00127     switch(e->type)
00128     {
00129         case LINK_ARRIVAL_EVENT:
00130             handle_link_arrival_event(e);
00131             break;
00132         case TICK_EVENT:
00133             handle_tick_event(e);
00134             break;
00135         default:
00136             _DBG("GenericRouterNoVcs:: Unk event exception %d", e->type);
00137             break;
00138     }
00139     return ;
00140 }               /* -----  end of function GenericRouterNoVcs::process_event  ----- */

00142 string
00143 GenericRouterNoVcs::print_stats()
00144 {
00145     stringstream str;
00146     str << "\n router[" << node_ip << "] packets: " << packets
00147         << "\n router[" << node_ip << "] flits: " << flits
00148         << "\n router[" << node_ip << "] packet latency: " << total_packet_latency
00149         << "\n router[" << node_ip << "] flits/packets: " << (flits+0.0)/(packets)
00150         << "\n router[" << node_ip << "] average packet latency: " << (total_packet_latency+0.0)/packets
00151         << "\n router[" << node_ip << "] last_flit_out_cycle: " << last_flit_out_cycle
00152         << " ";
00153 
00154     return str.str();
00155 }
00156 
00158 void
00159 GenericRouterNoVcs::handle_link_arrival_event ( IrisEvent* e )
00160 {
00161     LinkArrivalData* data = static_cast<LinkArrivalData*>(e->event_data.at(0));
00162     if(data->type == FLIT_ID)
00163     {
00164         /*  Update stats */
00165         flits++;
00166         if( data->ptr->type == TAIL || data->ptr->is_single_flit_pkt )
00167         {
00168             packets++;
00169         }
00170 
00171         /*Find the port the flit came in on */
00172         bool found = false;
00173         uint port = -1;
00174         for ( uint i=0 ; i< ports ; i++ )
00175             if(static_cast<GenericLink*>(input_connections[i])->input_connection) /*  This is here because we may assign null links to corner routers */
00176             if( e->src_id == static_cast<GenericLink*>(input_connections[i])->input_connection->address)
00177             {
00178                 found = true;
00179                 port = i;
00180                 break;
00181             }
00182 
00183         /* Throw and exception if it was not found */
00184         if( !found )
00185         {
00186             _DBG(" Input port not found src_addr: %d", e->src_id);
00187         }
00188 
00189         /* Push the flit into the buffer */
00190         in_buffers[port].change_push_channel(data->vc);
00191         in_buffers[port].push(data->ptr);
00192         decoders[port].push(data->ptr,data->vc);
00193         if( data->ptr->type == HEAD )
00194         {
00195             HeadFlit* hf = static_cast<HeadFlit*>(data->ptr);
00196             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].input_port = port;
00197             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].input_channel = data->vc;
00198             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].pipe_stage = FULL;
00199             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].possible_oports.clear(); 
00200             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].possible_ovcs.clear(); 
00201             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].possible_oports.resize(1); 
00202             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].possible_ovcs.resize(1); 
00203             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].possible_oports[0] = decoders[port].get_output_port(data->vc);
00204             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].possible_ovcs[0] = 0;
00205             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].length= hf->length;
00206             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].credits_sent= hf->length;
00207             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].arrival_time= ceil(Simulator::Now());
00208             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].clear_message= false;
00209             input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].flits_in_ib = 0;
00210 
00211         }
00212         else
00213         {
00214 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00215             _DBG(" BW inport:%d invc:%d oport:%d ovc:%d ft:%d", port, data->vc,
00216                  input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].output_port, input_buffer_state[port*vcs+data->vc].output_channel, data->ptr->type);
00217 #endif
00218 
00219         }
00220         
00221     }
00222     else if ( data->type == CREDIT_ID)
00223     {
00224         /* Find the corresponding output port */
00225         bool found = false;
00226         uint port = -1;
00227         for ( uint i=0 ; ports ; i++ )
00228             if(static_cast<GenericLink*>(output_connections[i])->output_connection) /* Some links of corner routers may be null */
00229             if( static_cast<GenericLink*>(output_connections[i])->output_connection->address == e->src_id)
00230             {
00231                 port = i;
00232                 found = true;
00233                 break;
00234             }
00235         if(!found)
00236         {
00237             _DBG(" Output port not found src_addr: %d", e->src_id);
00238         }
00239 
00240         downstream_credits[port][data->vc]++;
00241 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00242         _DBG(" Got a credit port:%d vc:%d in_buffers[port][vc]:%d ", port, data->vc, downstream_credits[port][data->vc]);
00243 #endif
00244 
00245     }
00246     else
00247     {
00248         _DBG( "handle_link_arrival_event Unk data type %d ", data->type);
00249     }
00250 
00251         /* Tick since you update a credit or flit */
00252         if(!ticking)
00253         {
00254             ticking = true;
00255             IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00256             event->type = TICK_EVENT;
00257             event->vc = e->vc;
00258             Simulator::Schedule( floor(Simulator::Now())+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, this, event);
00259         }
00260 
00261         delete data;
00262         delete e;
00263     return ;
00264 }               /* -----  end of function GenericRouterNoVcs::handle_link_arrival_event  ----- */
00265 
00266 void
00267 GenericRouterNoVcs::do_switch_traversal()
00268 {
00269     /* Switch traversal */
00270     for( uint i=0; i<ports*vcs; i++)
00271         if( input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == ST)
00272         {
00273                 uint oport = input_buffer_state[i].output_port;
00274                 uint iport = input_buffer_state[i].input_port;
00275                 uint ich = input_buffer_state[i].input_channel;
00276                 if( !xbar.is_empty(oport,0) 
00277                     && input_buffer_state[i].flits_in_ib > 0
00278                     && downstream_credits[oport][0]>0 )
00279                 {
00280                     in_buffers[iport].change_pull_channel(ich);
00281                     Flit* f = in_buffers[iport].pull();
00282                     input_buffer_state[i].flits_in_ib--;
00283                     
00284                     last_flit_out_cycle = Simulator::Now();
00285 
00286                     LinkArrivalData* data = new LinkArrivalData();
00287                     data->type = FLIT_ID;
00288                     data->vc = 0;
00289                     data->ptr = f;
00290 #ifdef _DEEP_DEBUG
00291                     _DBG(" FLIT OUT ftype: %d ", f->type);
00292                     switch( f->type)
00293                     {
00294                         case HEAD:
00295                             cout << static_cast<HeadFlit*>(f)->toString();
00296                             break;
00297                         case BODY:
00298                             cout << static_cast<BodyFlit*>(f)->toString();
00299                             break;
00300                         case TAIL:
00301                             cout << static_cast<TailFlit*>(f)->toString();
00302                             break;
00303                     }
00304 #endif
00305                     IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00306                     event->type = LINK_ARRIVAL_EVENT;
00307                     event->event_data.push_back(data);
00308                     event->src_id = address;
00309                     event->dst_id = output_connections[oport]->address;
00310                     event->vc = data->vc;
00311                     Simulator::Schedule( Simulator::Now()+1,
00312                                      &NetworkComponent::process_event,
00313                                      output_connections[oport],event);
00314                     downstream_credits[oport][0]--;
00315                     if( f->type == TAIL || f->is_single_flit_pkt )
00316                     {
00317                         input_buffer_state[i].clear_message = true;
00318                         input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage = EMPTY;
00319                         swa.clear_winner(input_buffer_state[i].output_port, input_buffer_state[i].input_port);
00320                         xbar.pull(input_buffer_state[i].output_port,input_buffer_state[i].output_channel);
00321 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00322     _DBG(" Tail FO clear pkt for inport %d inch %d oport %d ", iport, ich, oport);
00323 #endif
00324                         /* Update packet stats */
00325                         double lat = Simulator::Now() - input_buffer_state[i].arrival_time;
00326                         total_packet_latency+= lat;
00327                     }
00328                     else
00329                     {
00330 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00331     _DBG(" Flit out for inport %d inch %d oport %d fty: %d ", iport, ich, oport, f->type);
00332 #endif
00333                     }
00334 
00335                     /* Safe to send credits here as the flit is sure to empty
00336                      * the buffer. */
00337                         send_credit_back(i);
00338 
00339                 }
00340                 else
00341                 {
00342                     if(in_buffers[iport].get_occupancy(ich)==0)
00343                     {
00344 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00345                         _DBG_NOARG(" Waiting for flits on inch");
00346 #endif
00347 //                        ticking = true;
00348                     }
00349                     else if (xbar.is_empty(oport,0))
00350                     {
00351                         _DBG_NOARG(" switch was allocated but crossbar is empty ");
00352                     }
00353                     else if (downstream_credits[oport][0] == 0)
00354                     {
00355 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00356                         _DBG(" Waiting for downstream credits on oport %d ", oport);
00357 #endif
00358 //                       ticking = true;
00359                     }
00360                 }
00361 
00362         }
00363 
00364 }
00365 
00366 void
00367 GenericRouterNoVcs::do_switch_allocation()
00368 {
00369     /* Switch Allocation */
00370     for( uint i=0; i<ports*vcs; i++)
00371         if( input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == SWA_REQUESTED)
00372         {
00373             if ( !swa.is_empty())
00374             {
00375                 uint oport = -1;
00376                 SA_unit vca_winner;
00377                 uint iport = input_buffer_state[i].input_port;
00378                 uint ich = input_buffer_state[i].input_channel;
00379 
00380                 for ( uint j=0; j<input_buffer_state[i].possible_oports.size(); j++)
00381                 {
00382                     oport = input_buffer_state[i].possible_oports[j];
00383                     vca_winner = swa.pick_winner(oport);
00384                 }
00385 
00386                 if( vca_winner.port == iport )
00387                 {
00388                         input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage = ST;
00389                         input_buffer_state[i].output_port = oport;
00390                         input_buffer_state[i].output_channel = 0;
00391                         xbar.configure_crossbar(iport,oport,0);
00392                         xbar.push(oport,0); /* The crossbar is generic and needs to know the vc being used as well */
00393 
00394 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00395                 _DBG(" SWA won for inport %d oport %d ", iport, oport);
00396 #endif
00397                     /* After allocating the downstream path for this message
00398                      * send a credit on this inport for the HEAD. */
00399 //                    send_credit_back(i);
00400                 }
00401 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00402                 else
00403                 {
00404                     _DBG(" Dint win for inport %d SWA winner was inport %d for oport %d "
00405                          ,iport, vca_winner.port, oport);
00406                 }
00407 #endif
00408                 ticking = true;
00409             }
00410             else
00411             {
00412                 cout << "ERROR SWA was requested but the switch allocator has no requests" << endl;
00413             }
00414         }
00415 
00416 }
00417 
00419 void
00420 GenericRouterNoVcs::handle_tick_event ( IrisEvent* e )
00421 {
00422 
00423 #ifdef _DEEP_DEBUG
00424     _DBG_NOARG("input_buffer_state matrix\n");
00425     for( uint i=0; i<ports*vcs; i++)
00426         cout <<i<<" "<< input_buffer_state[i].toString()<< " buff_occ:" <<in_buffers[input_buffer_state[i].
00427             input_port].get_occupancy(input_buffer_state[i].input_channel) << endl;
00428 #endif
00429 
00430     ticking = false;
00431 
00432     /* We need to estimate the actual time at which the input buffer empties
00433      * and send the credit back. After SA it is known that the buffer for the
00434      * HEAD will empty in the next cycle and hence a credit can be sent to the
00435      * link for the HEAD. Post this a check for if the message is in ST and
00436      * there are flits doing IB. One can send a credit back for BODY and TAIL
00437      * flits such that the credit is at LT when the flit is in ST.
00438     for( uint i=0; i<(ports*vcs); i++)
00439         if( input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == ST || input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == SW_ALLOCATED)
00440         {
00441             if(in_buffers[input_buffer_state[i].input_port].get_occupancy(input_buffer_state[i].input_channel) >0 
00442                && input_buffer_state[i].credits_sent>0 )
00443                 send_credit_back(i);
00444         }
00445      * */
00446 
00447     do_switch_traversal();
00448     do_switch_allocation();
00449 
00450    
00451     /*  Input buffering 
00452      *  Flits are pushed into the input buffer in the link arrival handler
00453      *  itself. Just ensuring the state to IB is done last in reverse pipe
00454      *  order has all link_traversals have higher priority and get done before
00455      *  tick. */
00456     for( uint i=0; i<(ports*vcs); i++)
00457         if( input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == FULL )
00458     {
00459 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00460         _DBG(" IB + RC inport:%d oport:%d length:%d arrival_time: %f", input_buffer_state[i].input_port,
00461              input_buffer_state[i].output_port, input_buffer_state[i].length, Simulator::Now());
00462 #endif
00463             input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage = IB;
00464             ticking = true;
00465     }
00466 
00471     for( uint i=0; i<(ports*vcs); i++)
00472     {
00473             uint iport = input_buffer_state[i].input_port;
00474             uint ich = input_buffer_state[i].input_channel;
00475             uint oport = input_buffer_state[i].output_port ;
00476 
00477             if ((input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == ST || input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == IB )
00478 //                      || input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == SWA_REQUESTED 
00479                 && (input_buffer_state[i].flits_in_ib < in_buffers[iport].get_occupancy(ich)))
00480                 { 
00481                     input_buffer_state[i].flits_in_ib++;
00482                     ticking = true;
00483 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00484                 _DBG(" IB for BODY/TAIL for inport %d oport %d ", iport, oport);
00485 #endif
00486 
00489 //                    if( input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == ST && downstream_credits[oport][0] > 0)
00490 //                        send_credit_back(i);
00491                 }
00492     }
00493 
00494     /* Route and Request Switch Allocation */
00495     for( uint i=0; i<(ports*vcs); i++)
00496     {
00497         if( input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage == IB )
00498         {
00499             uint iport = input_buffer_state[i].input_port;
00500             uint ich = input_buffer_state[i].input_channel;
00501             uint oport = input_buffer_state[i].possible_oports[0];
00502             //input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage = ROUTED;
00503             if( !swa.is_requested(oport,iport) 
00504                 && downstream_credits[oport][0] > 0)
00505             {
00506                 swa.request(oport, iport);
00507                 input_buffer_state[i].pipe_stage = SWA_REQUESTED;
00508                 ticking = true;
00509 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00510                 _DBG(" Req SWA for inport %d inch %d oport %d ", iport, ich,oport);
00511 #endif
00512             }
00513 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00514             else
00515             {
00516                 if (swa.is_requested(oport, iport))
00517                 {
00518                     _DBG("Cant req SWA. SWA full inport:%d inch:%d oport:%d ",iport,ich,oport);
00519                 }
00520                 else if(downstream_credits[input_buffer_state[i].possible_oports[0]][input_buffer_state[i].possible_ovcs[0]] == 0)
00521                 {
00522                     _DBG("Not requesting SWA. No downstream credits for oport:%d ",oport);
00523                 }
00524             }
00525 #endif
00526 //            ticking = true;
00527         }
00528     }
00529     if(ticking)
00530     {
00531         ticking = true;
00532         IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00533         event->type = TICK_EVENT;
00534         event->vc = e->vc;
00535         Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event, this, event);
00536     }
00537 
00538         delete e;
00539     return;
00540 
00541 }               /* -----  end of function GenericRouterNoVcs::handle_input_arbitration_event  ----- */
00542 
00543 string
00544 GenericRouterNoVcs::toString() const
00545 {
00546     stringstream str;
00547     str << "GenericRouterNoVcs"
00548         << "\t addr: " << address
00549         << " node_ip: " << node_ip
00550         << "\n Input buffers: " << in_buffers.size() << " ";
00551     if( in_buffers.size() > 0)
00552         str << in_buffers[0].toString();
00553 
00554     str << "\n SWA: " << swa.toString();
00555 
00556     str << "\n decoders: " << decoders.size() << " ";
00557     if( decoders.size() > 0)
00558         str << decoders[0].toString();
00559 
00560     str << "\n Xbar ";
00561     str << xbar.toString();
00562 
00563     return str.str();
00564 }
00565 
00566 void
00567 GenericRouterNoVcs::send_credit_back(uint i)
00568 {
00569     if( input_buffer_state[i].credits_sent)
00570     {
00571     input_buffer_state[i].credits_sent--;
00572     LinkArrivalData* data = new LinkArrivalData();
00573     uint port = input_buffer_state[i].input_port;
00574     data->type = CREDIT_ID;
00575     data->vc = input_buffer_state[i].input_channel;
00576     IrisEvent* event = new IrisEvent();
00577     event->type = LINK_ARRIVAL_EVENT;
00578     event->event_data.push_back(data);
00579     event->src_id = address;
00580     event->vc = data->vc; 
00581     Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &NetworkComponent::process_event,input_connections[port], event);
00582 #ifdef _DEBUG_ROUTER
00583                     _DBG(" Credit back for inport %d inch %d ", port, data->vc);
00584 #endif
00585     }
00586 }
